stanzas: Seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness.
And all these things shall be added unto you. Hallelu, Hallelujah.
Men shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceeds from the mouth of God. Hallelu, Hallelujah.
Ask and it shall be given unto you, seek and ye shall find. Knock and it shall be opened unto you. Hallelu, Hallelujah.
If you abide in me, and my words abide in you. Hallelu, Hallelujah.
Ask what you will and it shall be given you. Hallelu, Hallelujah.
